___________________________________________________________________________________

01 - Insight The Choir
02 - La Resistance (Revolution)
03 - She&#039;s Like Water
04 - Lights, Camera, Disaster!
05 - Ride Or Die
06 - Somewhere Waiting
07 - Take Control
08 - Game Overdose
09 - Love At It&#039;s Worst
10 - Fatal Abstraction
11 - This Is Your Cue
12 - Rest In Peace; Jane Doe

--------------------------------------------

RELEASE NOTES:

Fusing the sounds of steady synth, hard-driven guitar riffs, pulsating beats?all behind Bokan&#039;s shrilling vocals?TTC blend to create the new post-hardcore. Hailing from all over Southern California, the twenty-somethings of TTC consider Huntington Beach, CA their home base. Orange County?with all its preliminary notions?is the breeding ground for many great bands and upcoming talent, but TTC does everything to defy these notions. TTC has remained self-sufficient by booking their own tours and acquiring their own sponsors (Paul Frank, Paer Clothing and Active Rideshop). TTC has shared the stage in a supporting role?often handpicked?by prominent bands such as, AFI, LostProphets, Eighteen Visions, Everytime I Die, Goldfinger and Saosin. Take The Crown has just finished recording their RISE Records release "RELAPSE REACT" with producer Kris Crummet, which is set to release May 13, 2008
____________________________________________________________________________
